content: format pdf file my patterns have text instructions using us crochet terms step-by-step photos the pattern is available in english us terms and russian сrochet skill level confident beginner all you will need for crocheting yarn art jeans 55% cotton 45% acrylic hook 1 5 safety eyes 5 mm hollofiber needle for sewing the size of the toy depends on the crochet density and the yarn thickness please consider it if you choose another type of yarn you can use any other yarn but then choose an appropriate size of a crochet hook i hope you liked my master class and everything was clear please feel free to contact me if necessary thank you very much
